text.tspan: It lacks adequate flexibility for simulating
CN and QN using the LD model

text.tspan: * Using bosons to DRU classifier [Ono et al., 2023]
* Using ion-trap to DRU classifier [Dutta et al., 2022]
* Using NV center to DRU classifier [Herrmann et al., 2023]
* DRU classifier with 1 qudit trained [Wach et al., 2023]
Lack of a spin-based DRU implementation
Using Technique with noise data set

Not use of QN and CN
